segments.text: Excuse me , miss . I'm a transit passenger for Flight No . 207 . Can you tell me where to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . Your plane leaves from Gate 12 . You should go to Gate 12 to board your plane
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take the escalator over there and turn left , you'll see the sign .
segments.speaker: S2
